General.Name: Ta Liang Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Ta Liang Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing of semiconductor inspection, PCB routing and drilling machines, resin panel cutters, CNC engraving and milling machines, and glass panel processing machines in Taiwan. It provides PCB routing machines for multilayer PCB, rigid-flex PCB, and BGA substrate applications; glass panel processing machines for touch panel, cover glass, and sensor glass or one glass processing applications; automatic edge coating machines; IC chip test and AVI handlers; P&P IC chip handlers; wafer AOIs; chiplets overlap measurement systems; SMT and SPI AOI lines; reel-to-reel AOI machines; IR vision inspection machines; thermal optical and incoming AOIs; auto vision inspection machines; CMP pad metrology in-situ monitor systems; and step-height metrology machines. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 49 Youlian Street, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
